data.title: US-listed Bitcoin Depot buys additional $5 million in Bitcoin
data.description: US Bitcoin ATM operator Bitcoin Depot (NASDAQ: BTM) announced that it has purchased an additional $5 million in Bitcoin as part of its financial strategy, which was first announced in June last year. With the purchase of 51 BTC yesterday, the company now holds 71.5 Bitcoins. (Globenewswire)

data.title: Blockchain game studio Midnight Society closes due to financial difficulties
data.description: Midnight Society, the production studio behind the blockchain game Deadrop, has confirmed its closure after facing financial difficulties and internal turmoil. Just a few days before the announcement of the closure of the company, employees received a two-day notice of the company's closure. Previously, co-founder Dr. Disrespect left in mid-2024 due to allegations of misconduct. Although the studio initially expressed confidence in continuing to develop and release Deadrop in 2025, insufficient funds and layoffs ultimately led to its closure. (NFT Plazas)

data.title: Midnight Society Closes Amid Financial Struggles And Internal Turmoil
data.description: According to PANews, the game development studio Midnight Society, known for its work on the blockchain game 'Deadrop,' has confirmed its closure following financial difficulties and internal unrest. Employees were informed of the company's shutdown just two days before the official announcement. The closure comes after co-founder Dr. Disrespect departed in mid-2024 due to allegations of misconduct. Despite initial assurances from the studio about continuing development and releasing 'Deadrop' in 2025, insufficient funding and staff layoffs ultimately led to its closure.

data.title: XeggeX Faces Security Breach Amid Operational Disruptions
data.description:
According to PANews, cryptocurrency exchange XeggeX announced on the X platform that its CEO's account was hacked, resulting in the loss of access to their Telegram account and community group. The exchange emphasized that securing their wallet and ensuring the safety of funds was a priority. They have disconnected their database from the network, which has caused login issues, and are conducting a thorough review. More detailed information will be provided once available.

Two hours prior to XeggeX's announcement, crypto media outlet BlockTempo suggested that XeggeX might be facing a crisis, as several users reported being unable to log into the platform. Additionally, all tokens were reportedly delisted from the official website, raising market concerns. The market experienced a significant downturn yesterday, potentially leading to a surge in withdrawal requests and a liquidity crisis. If the platform fails to resume normal operations, it could indicate a potential exit scam.

As of now, PANews reports that the XeggeX website displays a message stating "We will be back soon," and has not yet returned to normal operations.

data.title: Crypto News: Xeggex CEO’s Account Hacked, Funds Go Missing
data.description:

data.title: Yesterday, BlackRock’s Ethereum ETF transaction volume reached US$700 million, setting a new record high
data.description: Trader T monitoring shows that the trading volume of BlackRock Ethereum ETF ETHA reached $700 million yesterday, a record high. However, the net inflow/outflow of the ETF yesterday was 0. On the other hand, the trading volume of BlackRock Bitcoin ETF yesterday reached $4.2 billion. Similarly, the net inflow/outflow of the ETF yesterday was 0.

data.title: BTC fell below 101,000 USDT, and the 24-hour increase narrowed to 7.93%
data.description: OKX market shows that BTC fell below 101,000 USDT and is now at 100,966 USDT, with the 24-hour increase narrowed to 7.93%. (This newsletter is generated by AI)

data.title: Sui Bridge announces support for wBTC
data.description: Sui officially announced that Sui Bridge now supports wBTC to introduce the value of Bitcoin into the Sui DeFi ecosystem.

data.title: Yesterday, Fidelity FETH had a net inflow of $49.7 million, and FBTC had a net outflow of $177.6 million
data.description: Farside monitoring showed that yesterday the Fidelity Ethereum ETF FETH had a net inflow of US$49.7 million, while the Fidelity Bitcoin ETF FBTC had a net outflow of US$177.6 million.

data.title: A whale sent a total of about $9.24 million worth of AI16Z to CEX 5 hours ago
data.description: Arkham monitoring shows that a whale transferred a total of 21.338 million AI16Z to Bybit and Gate about 5 hours ago, worth about $9.24 million. The whale's associated address purchased these tokens from Jupiter from December to early January. At that time, the project's market value was over $1 billion. As of press time, the market value of AI16Z has fallen to $477 million.
